grid.sql: SELECT qryReport.rekv_id, qryReport.artikkel, qryReport.tegev, qryReport.allikas, sum(eelarve_2) AS eelarve_2, sum(taitmine_2) AS taitmine_2, sum(eelarve_1) AS eelarve_1, sum(taitmine_1) AS taitmine_1, sum(eelarve_0) AS eelarve_0, sum(taitmine_0) AS taitmine_0, a.nimetus :: VARCHAR(254), coalesce(a.is_kulud,false)::boolean as is_kulud FROM eelarve.eelarve_taitmine($1::integer, $2::integer, $3::integer) qryReport LEFT OUTER JOIN com_artikkel a ON a.kood :: TEXT = qryReport.artikkel :: TEXT GROUP BY qryReport.rekv_id, qryReport.artikkel, qryReport.tegev, qryReport.allikas, a.nimetus, a.is_kulud
